title: Cirkus
writer: Sanchit Bedre, Vidhi Ghodgaonkar, Yunus Sajawal
short_cast: Ranveer Singh, Varun Sharma, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez, Sanjay Mishra, Anil Mange, Murli Sharma, Siddarth Jadhav
cast: Ranveer Singh, Varun Sharma, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez, Sanjay Mishra, Anil Mange, Murli Sharma, Siddarth Jadhav
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
m_reason: mild violence, mild language, mild fear
desc: Chaos and comedy take the spotlight when a ringmaster and his band of acrobats set out to revive the fading culture of classic circus entertainment.
